select aggregate_licensee_class_id, discipline, enrollment_profile,
from ${schema}.df_aggregate_licensee_class where product_family = #{productFamily} order by aggregate_licensee_class_id

select dlc.detail_licensee_class_id, dlc.discipline, dlc.enrollment_profile, alc.aggregate_licensee_class_id, alc.discipline agg_discipline, alc.enrollment_profile agg_enrollment_profile from ${schema}.df_detail_licensee_class dlc join ${schema}.df_aggregate_licensee_class alc on dlc.aggregate_licensee_class_id = alc.aggregate_licensee_class_id where product_family = #{productFamily} order by dlc.detail_licensee_class_id

select dlc.detail_licensee_class_id, dlc.discipline, dlc.enrollment_profile, alc.aggregate_licensee_class_id, alc.discipline agg_discipline, alc.enrollment_profile agg_enrollment_profile from ${schema}.df_scenario, jsonb_array_elements(aacl_fields->'detailLicenseeClasses') detailLicenseeClasses, ${schema}.df_detail_licensee_class dlc, ${schema}.df_aggregate_licensee_class alc where df_scenario_uid = #{scenarioId} and (detailLicenseeClasses->>'detailLicenseeClassId')::int = dlc.detail_licensee_class_id and (detailLicenseeClasses->>'aggregateLicenseeClassId')::int = alc.aggregate_licensee_class_id order by dlc.detail_licensee_class_id
